Grouped_Utterances: Hi! I’ve been okay. I made an effort to spend time with my granddaughter, and it was nice. I felt really happy. It was a nice distraction from everything else. I felt lighter afterward. It was nice to escape into a different world for a bit. I tried it a few more times, and it’s getting easier to focus.  I finally talked to her about my feelings. She was really understanding. It felt relieving. I think it helped strengthen our connection. I think it’s a mix of worrying about my daughter and feeling stuck in my own life. Sometimes talking to friends helps, but I haven’t done that much lately.
We went to the zoo, and she loved it. It was fun to see her excitement. Yes, we’ve been more open with each other. It feels good.
I still struggle with sleep. I wake up a lot, and it’s frustrating. I’ve been trying to limit screen time before bed, but it’s hard to stick to.

Yes, I can do that. Reaching out to friends can be really beneficial. Would you like to set a goal to connect with a friend this week? Yes, I think that would help. Great! It could be a simple phone call or even a coffee date. Just something to connect with someone who supports you. I’ll try to do that.
